Name: RAYGUN COMMANDO VR 2
About the game: Drawing inspirations from light gun shooter arcade cabinets, Raygun Commando 2 is an on-rail reaction shooter in VR: features fast pace actions in exciting scenarios Oculus/WMR friendly design by minimizing unnecessary turning/head re-orienting physical room-scale locomotion only. Easy to jump into Fans who enjoyed the first game should find this sequel interesting
